description: Draws multiple rectangular prisms for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for draw_multiple_rectangular_prisms
result = draw_multiple_rectangular_prisms(data)

educational_standards.description: Measure volumes by counting unit cubes, using cubic cm, cubic in, cubic ft, and improvised units.

educational_standards.display_name: Right Rectangular Prism Volumes with Side Lengths
educational_standards.description: Calculate the volume of cubes and rectangular prisms.

educational_standards.display_name: Right Rectangular Prism Volumes with Base Area
educational_standards.description: Apply the formula V = b × h for rectangular prisms to find volumes of right rectangular prisms with whole-number edge lengths in mathematical problems.
Apply the formulas V = b × h or V = l × w × h for rectangular prisms to find volumes of right rectangular prisms with whole-number edge lengths in the context of solving real-world problems.
Apply the volume formulas V = l w h and V = B h to find volumes of right rectangular prisms

educational_standards.display_name: Volume of Rectangular Prisms: Word Problems
educational_standards.description: Solve real world problems involving the volume of right rectangular prisms.

educational_standards.display_name: Surface Area of Cubes and Rectangular Prisms
educational_standards.description: Calculate the surface area of cubes and rectangular prisms.
